About.paragraph: Provide a prepared environment with intuitive, complete, engaging and inviting materials that promote self-study, independent thinking and foster creativity.

Services.name: STANDARD PROGRAM
Services.text: Based on the Montessori method, the program was developed with all areas in alignment with the method by providing students with prepared settings to explore and experience the environment on their own so that they can effectively reach their innate potential.

Services.name: BILINGUAL PROGRAM
Services.text: Based on the Montessori method, the program was developed with all areas in alignment with the method by providing students with prepared settings to explore and experience the environment on their own so that they can effectively achieve their innate potential.

Services.name: INTERNATIONAL PROGRAM
Services.text: Based on the Montessori method, the program was developed with all areas in alignment with the method by providing students with prepared settings to explore and experience the environment on their own so that they can effectively achieve their innate potential.
